physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Last CD4 count 1.25 x 10^9 cells/L; viral load 150 copies/mL in male patient with recurrent C. difficile infection. Last CD4 count 0.15 x 10^9 cells/L; viral load 320 copies/mL in female patient with recurrent C. difficile infection.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient's diarrhea and abdominal pain resolved the next day after fecal microbiota therapy. No recurrences during 5 years of follow-up in male patient; 6 weeks of follow-up in female patient.
